Material Things Lollipop Theme v2.1.5 {KatCore}.apk


Material Things is an icon theme for your android phone or tablet inspired by material design. Color up your display with some simple, clean material Icons. Included with the hand-crafted icons are matching wallpapers, and widgets for clocks, battery & weather. Widgets offer color, size, and font customization and over 200 custom made and hand-picked wallpapers included.

â˜…FULL VERSIONâ˜…

Free version here: https://www.google.com/url?q=https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.natewren.materialthingsfree


 Features:

â˜… 1650+ Hand-crafted HD icons

â˜… 75+ HD wallpapers - Hosted on the cloud. Choose and save the ones you want. (All wallpapers shown are included)

â˜… Two battery widgets

â˜… Digital clock widget

â˜… Flashlight Widget

â˜… Analog Clock Widget

â˜… Weather widget

â˜… Muzei support for rotating wallpapers

â˜… New Icons added constantly

â˜… All material wallpapers shown are included!

â˜… XXXHDPI high definition icons included for super large HD screens. All Icons are 192x192.

â˜… 14 Customized material designed wallpapers. Wallpapers are 3D renders inspired by the theme and material design.

â˜… Contains over 1650 different clean, flat and material design-based icons with many variations of default icons such as phone, contacts, camera, etc.

â˜… Wallpaper chooser comes installed. Browse and download via the cloud.

â˜… Integrated icon request or easy link to request icons via a contact form.

â˜… Clean, material, icons go with any background.

â˜… Constantly updated along with my other icon packs!


Compatible Launchers (There are free versions of these. Dev recommends Nova Launcher)

â˜… Apply icon pack with ADW Launcher - Recommended size: 110%

â˜… Apply icon pack with Action Launcher

â˜… Apply icon pack with Apex Launcher - Recommended size: 110%

â˜… Apply icon pack with Atom Launcher

â˜… Apply icon pack with Aviate Launcher

â˜… Apply icon pack with Go Launcher

â˜… Apply icon pack with Holo Launcher (through launcher settings)

â˜… Apply icon pack with Inspire Launcher

â˜… Apply icon pack with KK Launcher

â˜… Apply icon pack with Lucid Launcher

â˜… Apply icon pack with Next Launcher

â˜… Apply icon pack with Nine Launcher

â˜… Apply icon pack with Nova Launcher - Recommended size: 110%

â˜… Apply icon pack with Solo Launcher

Note: You need a launcher or an app like unicon to apply the theme. Most of the launchers above offer free versions. Feel free to contact me with questions:



 How to apply the theme 

â˜… Open the app after installing

â˜… Press "Apply Theme"

â˜… Select Launcher type

â˜…â˜…Install via Launcherâ˜…â˜…

Apex Launcher: Apex settings > Theme settings

Nova Launcher: Nova Settings > Look and feel > Icon Theme

ADW Launcher: On home screen, press "Menu" > More > ADWSettings > Themes Preferences > Select theme

â˜… Holo Launcher: Onhome screen, press "Menu" > Launcher Settings > Appearance Settings > Icon Pack > Select Theme
